attributes.action: Improve Broadband speeds in this country
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to help companies improving internet speeds - they are some of the worst around and I think it's wrong that companies should be allowed to advertise this way. for example I should be getting 20MB and on a good day I can get 1.5MB - where is the rest of it? I hope you understand my point and sign this petition to do something about it.
